ATTENTION BOSTON FASHION FANS: ITS STUDENT FASHION SEASON!

 

Every spring our area's fashion schools produce top notch runway fashion shows that showcase the work of their students. The opportunity to see emerging design talent at these shows makes this one of my favorite times of the year!

The list of well known, established, and successful fashion professionals that Boston's fashion educational institutions have produced is much to long to list here. Don't miss the chance to see the next generation of designers present their collections.  I have listed the remaining shows and links to event websites below.

See you there!

Kathy Benharris

Boston Fashion Meetup
